pitrou commented on issue #2810: ARROW-2535: [Python] Provide pre-commit hooks that check flake8
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2810#issuecomment-431690930
 
 
   I don't know anything about this, is it something you have to add manually to your git configuration?

----------------------------------------------------------------

xhochy commented on issue #2810: ARROW-2535: [Python] Provide pre-commit hooks that check flake8
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2810#issuecomment-431691055
 
 
   When you want to use this, you need to intially run once `pip install pre-commit && pre-commit install`. This is not forcing it on users but is rather opt-in. I plan to add a second entry that call the clang-format docker container.

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

users@infra.apache.org

xhochy commented on a change in pull request #2810: ARROW-2535: [Python] Provide pre-commit hooks that check flake8
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2810#discussion_r227047491
 
 

 ##########
 File path: .pre-commit-config.yaml
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+repos:
+  - repo: git://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks
+    sha: v1.2.3
+    hooks:
+     - id: flake8
+       args: [--count, crossbow, integration, python]
 
 Review comment:
   Adding the directories here was a mistake. I'll remove them again. 
   
   @kszucs Any idea on how to adjust which files go into which flake call? Currently a `.py` file is passed to both instances of `flake8` while it should only be evaluated by the first.

----------------------------------------------------------------

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: We should provide pre-commit hooks that users can install (optionally) that check e.g. flake8 and clang-format.
fields.summary: [Python] Provide pre-commit hooks that check flake8

comments.body: [~wesmckinn] I remember that you have some code in this direction. Can you post this again? I would then turn this into a pre-commit hook and add some documentation.

[~xhochy] Might be an overkill, but https://pre-commit.com/ works pretty well. There are plugins for flake8 and clang-format: https://pre-commit.com/hooks.html

Sample config: https://github.com/daskos/daskos/blob/master/.pre-commit-config.yaml
I will do {{clang-format}} in a separate PR, limiting the scope of this to {{flake8}}
